text: Comedic power couple Megan Mullally and Nick Offerman get very chatty about their relationship in their new book, The Greatest Love Story Ever Told. Mullally, 59, and Offerman, 48, have a romance like no other, and in the book which proves this once and for all, the couple ( best known for their turns on Will & Grace and Parks and Recreation, respectively ) give readers an intimate — and hilarious — window into their dynamic. Along with gorgeous original photographs and illustrations, as well as a few individual essays, the book is comprised of transcripts between the two of them, as they detail how they met, what their day - to - day lives look like, and much more.
